text:
Having just moved to Berlin we visited Mauerpark
on Sunday for its popular flea market, live

Mauer Park, meaning 'Wall Park' refers to
its former status as part of the Berlin Wall

The popular flea market features grid stalls
selling everything from vintage fashions,

vinyl CD's, GDR memorabilia, antiques and
street food.

This was the perfect way for us to spend our
first Sunday in Berlin.
